title: Add Amazon referral link for hair/skin care product

requirements.text: Add a new referral link entry to the backend with the Amazon affiliate URL 'https://amzn.to/3OzRf1C', categorized under either hair care or skin care, with an appropriate product title and description
acceptanceCriteria: The referral link is stored in the backend with the exact URL 'https://amzn.to/3OzRf1C'
The link is assigned to either the hair care or skin care category
The link includes a descriptive title and description appropriate for the product
The link appears in the portfolio showcase section on the frontend
Clicking the card increments the click counter and redirects to the Amazon URL

requirements.text: Generate a product thumbnail image for the new Amazon referral link that visually represents the hair care or skin care product
acceptanceCriteria: The generated image is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated
The image filename follows the pattern used for other referral link thumbnails
The BoardCard component correctly displays the generated thumbnail for this referral link

constraints: Preserve the existing referral link data structure and schema
Maintain the current click tracking functionality
Do not modify the frontend/src/hooks or frontend/src/components/ui directories
nonGoals: Modifying existing referral links for bedroom, living room, or DIY categories
Changing the overall website design or layout
Adding authentication or user management features

required: Hair care or skin care product thumbnail image with warm, elegant styling matching the Pinterest aesthetic (amazon-product.dim_400x300.png)
